alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:27AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hempstead, central Miller and Lafayette Counties, northwestern Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes, eastern Marion, southeastern Cass and northeastern Harrison Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 926 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saratoga to near Genoa to near Fouke to near Brightstar to McLeod to near Marshall. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hope, Stamps, Lewisville, Vivian, Oil City, Fouke, Bradley, Emmet, Hosston, Blevins, Perrytown, Rodessa, Garland, Ida, Fulton, Washington, Gilliam, Smithland, Canfield and Karnack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
